item.description:
With Lucy Kinski, we are organising a new online seminar series on political representation: ğ™ğ™š:ğ—£ğ—¿ğ—²ğ˜€ğ—²ğ—»ğ˜ğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—»ğ˜€!

The series aspires to facilitate an inclusive, supportive, and dynamic environment in which scholarly work on anything representation can be presented and discussed.

Each online seminar will consist of a 30-minute presentation, followed by meaningful opportunities for the audience to be involved in the discussion.

You can propose a presentation and register for events on the website of the series. There is also a Google Calendar, which we will be kept up-to-date with upcoming events.

More information is available at www.representations.online.
